channel.title: os on Software engineering notes
channel.description: Recent content in os on Software engineering notes

item.title: OS
item.description: File descriptor (FD) open a file by calling system call open() that specifies access mode (read, write, or both), then the kernel returns FD number to the program Use the FD by performing I/O operations on the file such as read() or write() Close the FD by calling system call close() When the program terminates, either normally or due to an error, all open file descriptors are automatically closed by the kernel 動態庫與靜態庫 linux 下有動態庫和靜態庫.
